headline: Here's Why Investors Should Avoid Zebra Technologies for Now
summary: Increasing costs and high debt levels are weighing on ZBRA. Unfavorable foreign currency movement is an added concern.

headline: Zebra Technologies to Release First Quarter Results on April 29
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., April 01, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, will report its first quarter 2025 financial results on Tues. morning, April 29, 2025.
